## Source: amazon-inspector (07acaccf5cae78ad4bfd5f967e15c5ba68180c1350310492a9065ca97124bf26)
The package accounts-base was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (91aded18014deeb9f278bcd61adcdf917bad7b7e50159b48c125f453f19681cf)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'accounts-base' @ 23.5.6 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
